Title: Relating to medical use of cannabis, to the effectiveness thereof and to the controlled substances therapeutic research act; repealer
Summary: Relates to the medical use of cannabis; repeals controlled substances therapeutic research act.
LawCode: Amd §§3, 30, 31, 32, 34, 37, 41 & 42, add §32-a, Cannabis L; rpld Art 33-A, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to medical use cannabis; and to repeal article 33-A of the public health law relating to the controlled substances therapeutic research act
